snippet.title: Classic Game Room - HANGMAN for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Hangman review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Classic Game Room reviews HANGMAN for the Atari 2600 video game system from 1978. Do you remember hangman?  If not then do you know what Wheel of Fortune is?  Basically the same thing without a wheel, money and big, big prizes (and that cool bankruptcy thing).  This is a fun word game that incorporates violence at the gallows if a misspelling takes place.  Hangman is a fun Atari game, and a true arcade classic retro gaming style for old school video gamers who like game from the 70's and 80's.  

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. CGRHD is reviewing video game from the past 30 years, from 1978 to the present including Playstation 3 PS3, Sega Genesis, Nintendo Entertainment System NES, Atari 2600, 7800, N64, Dreamcast and Xbox 360. XBLA.  Hang man spelling.
